str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From eu and phren; to put in a good frame of mind, i.e. Rejoice.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
The tongue; by implication, a language.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To exult, be full of joy. From agan and hallomai; properly, to jump for joy, i.e. Exult.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and skenoo; to camp down, i.e. Haunt; figuratively, to remain.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.
